titles.title: A resolution authorizing picture of the House while in session.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/9/1987--Introduced. Permits the United States Capitol Historical Society to take official pictures of the House of Representatives in session, at a time designated by the Speaker, for inclusion in new editions of "We the People" and "The Capitol." Declares such pictures available for nonprofit news and educational purposes.
